results.name: Number of distinct base-10 digits of n.
comment: a(n) = 10 for almost all n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 02 2013
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Count[DigitCount@ #, n_ /; n > 0] & /@ Range@ 120 (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 29 2015 *)
program: a043537 = length . nub . show  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 16 2011
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
